entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TerraxGuardsmanDescription
entry.value: Elite infantry geared for close combat. Equipped with Meltaguns as special weapons. Can inspire and execute adjacent troops.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TerraxStormTrooperDescription
entry.value: Elite melee infantry with volatile weapons. Plasma Pistols can be overcharged for further deadly effect. Can inspire and execute adjacent troops.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TerraxLascannonSquadDescription
entry.value: Elite ranged infantry with anti-armour weapons. Can inspire adjacent troops. Can execute troops within 3 tiles, including vehicles.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/TerraxColonelDescription
entry.value: Elite Hero unit that provides bonuses to nearby allied units.
